verses.verse: In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6645>Zibiah<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3384>instructed<s%> him.

But the <S%H1116>high<s%> places were not <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away:<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> places.

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H6944>dedicated<s%> things that is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even the <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> the account, the <S%H3701>money<s%> that every <S%H5315>man<s%> is <S%H6187>set<s%> at, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that <S%H5927>comes<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> any <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

Let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it to them, every <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H4378>acquaintance:<s%> and let them <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>wherever<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H919>breach<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found.<s%>

But it was so, that in the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had not <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the other <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4069>Why<s%> <S%H2388>repair<s%> you not the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house?<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> more <S%H3701>money<s%> of your <S%H4378>acquaintance,<s%> but <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it for the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H225>consented<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> more <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1115>neither<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H727>chest,<s%> and <S%H5344>bored<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H1817>lid<s%> of it, and <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>side<s%> as <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>door<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it was so, when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7225>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H727>chest,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and they <S%H6696>put<s%> up in <S%H6696>bags,<s%> and <S%H4487>told<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> being <S%H8505>told,<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of them that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work,<s%> that had the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and they <S%H3318>laid<s%> it out to the <S%H6086>carpenters<s%> and <S%H1129>builders,<s%> that <S%H6213>worked<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

And to <S%H1443>masons,<s%> and <S%H2672>hewers<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewed<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> that was <S%H3318>laid<s%> out for the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H2393>repair<s%> it.

However, there were not <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5592>bowls<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H4212>snuffers,<s%> <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets,<s%> any <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> or <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>
But they <S%H5414>gave<s%> that to the <S%H6213>workmen,<s%> <S%H4399><s%> and <S%H2388>repaired<s%> therewith the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Moreover they <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> not with the <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to be <S%H5414>bestowed<s%> on <S%H6213>workmen:<s%> <S%H4399><s%> for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully.<s%>
The <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> and sin <S%H3701>money<s%> was not <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it was the <S%H3548>priests'.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it: and <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> things that <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> and <S%H3088>Jehoram,<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> had <S%H6942>dedicated,<s%> and his own <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> things, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> it to <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria:<s%> and he <S%H5927>went<s%> away from <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and made a <S%H7195>conspiracy,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H3101>Joash<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> which <S%H3381>goes<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5538>Silla.<s%>

For <S%H3108>Jozachar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8100>Shimeath,<s%> and <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7763>Shomer,<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and he <S%H4191>died;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
